_sText:
BETA #4 IS OUT!!!!

BETA 1:
Initial release

BETA 2:
Fixed the fence being able to open on touch.
Tweaked the "launchers" in the water to shoot you at a better angle.

BETA 3:
Added clip textures to stop people from getting back up on the launcher.
Added a camera.
Added cubemaps.
Optimized the level more.

BETA 4:
Added ambient sounds.
Fixed the black stripe
Made better use of the cubemaps.
Added decals and more detail.

KNOWN BUGS:
None really, just people being able to stop themselves in the launcher.

WHATS COMING IN BETA 5:
Going to add HDR.
Optimize a little more.
Get ready to go final.
Hopefully fix people stopping themselves in the launchers.

This is just the BETA version, expect a lot more =]

Well i was playing cs not to long ago and i came across a map i hadn't played in forever, I love to play source, so i decided i would remake the map into source, i searched online to see if this had been done, There is awp_snowskeet, but its not the same as the original duckhunt. In the Original Duckhunt every round you switch spawns, this one is just like that except its random.(I couldn't figure a way to do it every round, so its random)  So u might play 2 rounds as the "duck" then 1 round as the "hunter" it just depends on what happens. It holds 32 players. I would recommend turning up sv_airaccelerate to 100+. I hope you have fun with this map. 

IF YOU PUT THIS ON YOUR SERVER TELL ME, ILL COME AND PLAY =]

-Weidey

Extract to your cstrike/maps folder if u wanna play single player with it.
